backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report describing two frontend hero‑logo related features and their associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text-based summaries of all major frontend files including components, styles, assets, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base setup with OKLCH design tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React page rendering hero slider, services, trust points, brand logos, gallery, map embed, and utility components.
frontend/src/components/BusinessHighligh: Component showing four clickable business info items like location, hours, call, and WhatsApp links.
frontend/src/components/MobileCareSmartU: Component listing smartphone care facts with a show‑more toggle.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppQuickMes: Popover component offering quick WhatsApp message shortcuts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, stored identity restoration, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme CSS variables, dark mode values, typography, and a custom texture utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, typography, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and image-editing needs for the Gadget Zone website.
